lead_paragraph: Riley Swanson’s interception in the fourth quarter sparked a comeback that gave Wake Forest its first Atlantic Coast Conference title in 36 years and sent the Demon Deacons to the first Bowl Championship Series game in team history.
snippet: Riley Swanson’s interception in the fourth quarter sparked a comeback that gave Wake Forest its first Atlantic Coast Conference title in 36 years and sent the Demon Deacons to the first Bowl Championship Series game in team history.
